for how friggin big moose are, they may be some of the dumbest animals out there. They literally act and move around like a 2 year old stuck in andre the giants body lol. My dad had one decide to fight his car in Alberta.
They're just big pussy cats really and if you talk nice to them they'll even pose for a picture for you.
i think she thinks you cant see her because she is "hiding"

She actually followed me, I saw her a couple hundred feet earlier and snapped this 2nd picture then I walked away and she went thru the trees and came out again and when I took the 1st picture she was only 50' away. Just a big ole friendly girlÂ  LOL
Hilarious but glad they didn't get stomped

I don't trust those things at all. Bears are more predictable than moose. One year I was sitting on some access stairs into the Russian River in Alaska when a 2 year old moose came up the river. It walked into the pool in front of me took a drink and then approached me. As I didn't want to get my butt kicked I stood up and backed away. Turns out he was just curious as he seemed to shrug his shoulders and turn back out into the river. He was only a few feet away when he turned.
